remarks: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for sum: if ` x ` is (effectively) not free in ` A ` and ` B ` , it is not free in ` sum_ k e. A B ` . (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2019.)
statement:
nfsum.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
nfsum.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
nfsum $p |- F/_ x sum_ k e. A B $.
